Kohanga Reo-raised Mataia Keepa says Matariki is reclaiming women’s place in ceremony https://www.nzherald.co.nz/rotorua-daily-post/news/child-of-the-kohanga-reo-movement-mataia-keepa-says-matariki-front-footing-the-reclamation-of-仪式上的女性/WPCKKZVZ75HU7G2NEKO3GAN77U/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/rotorua-daily-post/news/child-of-the-kohanga-reo-movement-mataia-keepa-says-matariki-front-footing-the-reclamation-of-仪式上的女性/WPCKKZVZ75HU7G2NEKO3GAN77U/ Aleyna MartinezTohunga reo Mataia Keepa is proud to have been raised in the Kōhanga Reo environment. Fri, 05 Jul 2024 04:06:00 +0000 Professor Rangi Matamua (left) was one of the kaikarakia at Thursday's hautapu in Rotorua. He is pictured with Mataia Keepa, who led the ceremony at Whakarewarewa Village. Photo / Aleyna Martinez
Whangārei District Council appeals ruling that it pay wronged contractor Jimmy Daisley $4.2m https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/whangarei-district-council-appeals-ruling-that-it-pay-wronged-contractor-42-million/N6I5UNAWPVCHFNMBDSNR3SUUEI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/whangarei-district-council-appeals-ruling-that-it-pay-wronged-contractor-42-million/N6I5UNAWPVCHFNMBDSNR3SUUEI/ Mike DinsdaleA Whangārei contractor's 20-year legal battle with the council is set to continue. Fri, 05 Jul 2024 04:00:00 +0000 Northland contractor Jimmy Daisley will have to wait longer for his claims against Whangārei District Council to be resolved, after the council voted to appeal a Court of Appeal decision that reaffirmed it had to pay him millions for negligence.
Nelson man’s 20-year collection of child exploitation material contained ‘worst content from any part of the internet’ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/nelson-mans-20-year-collection-of-child-exploitation-material-contained-worst-content-from-any-part-of-the-internet/ I4YTWNZDARHGRJSXWVQLUUIUKM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/nelson-mans-20-year-collection-of-child-exploitation-material-contained-worst-content-from-any-part-of-the-internet/ I4YTWNZDARHGRJSXWVQLUUIUKM/ Tracy Neal'They were real victims and their suffering was recorded for the world to see.' Fri, 05 Jul 2024 03:21:34 +0000 Bevan Harman's collection of child exploitation material gathered over 20 years included some of the worst content available on the internet, Judge Tony Zohrab said. Photo / Tracy Neal
